message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 40% and take the rest, fair for my skills
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but you'll still get a decent chunk
You're getting desperate, I'll give you 20%
I'll give you a bit more, but you're still getting a good chunk
You're running out of time, take the last 10%
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give in completely
You're almost out of time, take the last 5%
Let's meet in the middle, one last time
